in this post, i'm expressing my opinion on the importance of protecting personal information and data privacy. i'm using the hashtags #datenschutz (data privacy), #privatsphÃ¤re (privacy), and #sicherheit (security) to reach a wider audience and connect with others who share my concerns. by using the phrase "nicht nur ein recht, es ist eine pflicht" (not just a right, it's a duty), i'm emphasizing the urgency and responsibility we have to protect our personal data.
